body: Couldn't they like, add something actually useful for once? It used to be such a simple block game but they haven't made a single addition that isn't one of those weird creatures or whatever since release 1.8, and it hasn't exactly been pure all the way since Beta 1.8.
body_html: Couldn't they like, add something actually useful for once? It used to be such a simple block game but they haven't made a single addition that isn't one of those weird creatures or whatever since release 1.8, and it hasn't exactly been pure all the way since Beta 1.8.

author.bio: Hi there, I'm Reverie, or Gray, whatever you prefer. I'm just here to look at memes and pretty pictures but sometimes I might comment on things. Sometimes my opinions, sometimes stupid thoughts, or both in one.
author.bio_html: Hi there, I'm Reverie, or Gray, whatever you prefer. I'm just here to look at memes and pretty pictures but sometimes I might comment on things. Sometimes my opinions, sometimes stupid thoughts, or both in one.

body: I started playing when the game was in version 1.8. So far the only update I liked was the ocean update, in a way diving into underwater caves was something new to do. Nether update is alright, but maybe it's hard for me to have an opinion since I never spend any time in the nether, go in, get warts and rods, then go out and usually never have a reason to go back in unless I want to make highways. Rest of the updates only feel like fillers, they're nothing new or exciting, just more stuff to fill the game with to make it feel like there's a lot to do.
body_html: I started playing when the game was in version 1.8. So far the only update I liked was the ocean update, in a way diving into underwater caves was something new to do. Nether update is alright, but maybe it's hard for me to have an opinion since I never spend any time in the nether, go in, get warts and rods, then go out and usually never have a reason to go back in unless I want to make highways. Rest of the updates only feel like fillers, they're nothing new or exciting, just more stuff to fill the game with to make it feel like there's a lot to do.

body:
I mean, here's some pics of what Minecraft used to look like:

https://www.fearlessgamer.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/2011-02-22_16.33.39-1024x542.png

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qMxeBCMrEHA/maxresdefault.jpg

https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/minecraft_gamepedia/images/5/57/Alpha_v1.0.0.png/revision/latest

https://i.imgur.com/xHj61vG.jpg

https://farm4.static.flickr.com/3656/3615985305_b7c19789f8.jpg

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVx0Dh3WkAADueC?format=jpg&name=medium

https://screenshots.gamebanana.com/img/ss/gamefiles/5f092e344bd06.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/MsXaP.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/nN6uV.jpg

All these fundamental changes in my opinion have made it lose a lot of its appeal. I'd go as far as to say that it's a different genre now.
body_html:
I mean, here's some pics of what Minecraft used to look like:

https://www.fearlessgamer.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/2011-02-22_16.33.39-1024x542.png

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qMxeBCMrEHA/maxresdefault.jpg

https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/minecraft_gamepedia/images/5/57/Alpha_v1.0.0.png/revision/latest

https://i.imgur.com/xHj61vG.jpg

https://farm4.static.flickr.com/3656/3615985305_b7c19789f8.jpg

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVx0Dh3WkAADueC?format=jpg&name=medium

https://screenshots.gamebanana.com/img/ss/gamefiles/5f092e344bd06.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/MsXaP.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/nN6uV.jpg

All these fundamental changes in my opinion have made it lose a lot of its appeal. I'd go as far as to say that it's a different genre now.

body:
Theres a resource pack that everyone should have already called Programmers Art or something, and it's the old textures. 

It's already in your game so you dont have to download it. (at least I think, because I didnt download the pack, and I have it)

parent.body:
Theres a resource pack that everyone should have already called Programmers Art or something, and it's the old textures. 

It's already in your game so you dont have to download it. (at least I think, because I didnt download the pack, and I have it)

Theres a resource pack that everyone should have already called Programmers Art or something, and it's the old textures.

It's already in your game so you dont have to download it. (at least I think, because I didnt download the pack, and I have it)
